Venom dodges the shots, moving gracefully to the left of them.

Venom: DANC=
E!

He aimed and fired a deadly poisonous glob at Periwinkle! Bombshell the=
n fires one of his accurate long range grenades at Periwinkle...

  ----- O=
riginal Message ----- 
  From: *Orchid* 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Se=
nt: Thursday, January 31, 2002 3:23 AM
  Subject: Re: War in Chivtrons Base=
/Help for Windlord


  McGowan: Damn it. Get out here and fight, you pussie=
s!!!

  ~~~~~~

  Hazel overheard this in the Chivtron base.

  Hazel: Damn=
. Periwinkle, go fight them.

  Periwinkle: Alone!?

  Hazel: GO!

  Periwi=
nkle runs off.

  Bronze: Their going to kick her ass.

  Hazel: Probably.
=

  ~~~~~~

  Virgo smiles upon seeing Periwinkle step out of the Chivtron b=
ase.

  McGowan: Okay. Now, we just rip into her to attract the other shitr=
ons.

  McGowan fires off a missile at Periwinkle. Virgo fires off an energ=
y draining dart towards Periwinkle and Lee fires a fireball towards her. Ba=
rrymore fires off a missile at Periwinkle while Depp fired 6 plasma shots t=
owards her. Papertron launches a grenade that lands behind Periwinkle while=
 Birdbot threw a knife at her.

  Papertron: COOOOOOOONE!

  Birdbot: ROCK =
'N' ROLL!

  Periwinkle barely avoids McGowan's missile. It strikes the gro=
und near her, creating a dust cloud which blurs her vision and is struck by=
 Virgo's dart. She pulls it out but it doesn't do any good as she begins to=
 feel weaker. Her vision clears up and has enough time to sidestep, only ge=
tting grazed on the arm. 2 out of 6 of Depp's shots strike her while she do=
dges Barrymore's missile but Birdbot's knife flies into her left leg, sendi=
ng her to her knees as she fires at McGowan twice, once at Depp and twice a=
t Venom. The shots sail past McGowan, as they weren't very well aimed and D=
epp let's the single shot strike him...

    ----- Original Message ----- 
=
    From: Narrator 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Wednesday, Ja=
nuary 30, 2002 2:19 AM
    Subject: Re: War in Chivtrons Base/Help for Wind=
lord


    Chop Shop yawns. Bombshell looks at an invisible watch. Shrapnel=
 falls asleep. Venom starts humming some stupid sounding song. Kickback sta=
rts laughing for no apparent reason. Barrage stares off into space, having =
a day dream.

    Ransack: If they're not going to fight us man to man, wha=
t's the point?...

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Rudra656=
@... 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Monday, January 28,=
 2002 7:42 PM
      Subject: Re: War in Chivtrons Base/Help for Windlord


=
      ::Terrataur/Aerotaur:: 
            She scampers inside after the oth=
ers, detonating the tunnel behind her.  She heads up to the bridge.  "They'=
re all inside chief." 

            Aerotaur nods.  "Good, now we just have=
 to wait them out and hope the shields hold."

oups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.

roups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service. 


        Yahoo! Groups S=
ponsor

o! Terms of Service.
